attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On the 28 of August 2007. Two men were sentenced to 15 and 12 months in prison for graffiti. The two men were extremely remorseful for their actions, they had no previous convictions and presented the crown court judge with strong character references. They also pleaded guilty at the earliest opportunity. They were given a highly unfair sentence for a pair of non violent criminals.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
